time_on_asset_daily.name: course_id
time_on_asset_daily.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

time_on_asset_daily.name: date
time_on_asset_daily.description: The date for which the analytics are computed

time_on_asset_daily.name: username
time_on_asset_daily.description: The username of the learner on the edX platform

time_on_asset_daily.name: module_id
time_on_asset_daily.description: The ID of the module touched by the learner (including video, problem, text, vertical, sequential - see course axis)

time_on_asset_daily.name: time_umid5
time_on_asset_daily.description: Total time on module (by module_id) in seconds, with a 5-minute timeout

time_on_asset_daily.name: time_umid30
time_on_asset_daily.description: Total time on module (by module_id) in seconds, with a 30-minute timeout

description: Table generated with SQL query file time_on_asset_daily.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the analytics about how much time is spend on course items/assets by learners, broken down by day.
